title: WA Robot Approve Response
description: Schema for the data field when calling 'wa robot approve <code>'. Validates and consumes approval tokens. On success, returns approval details. On failure, returns envelope error with stable E_* code.

code.description: The approval code that was submitted

valid.description: Whether the approval code was valid and consumed (always true in success response; failures use envelope error)

action_kind.description: The action type this approval was for (e.g., 'SendText', 'WorkflowRun')

created_at.description: Unix timestamp (ms) when the approval token was created

pane_id.description: The pane ID the approval was scoped to (null if not pane-specific)

expires_at.description: Unix timestamp (ms) when the approval would have expired

consumed_at.description: Unix timestamp (ms) when the approval was consumed

action_fingerprint.description: Hash of the action this approval was issued for

dry_run.description: If true, approval was validated but not consumed (--dry-run flag)

$comment: Error responses use envelope format: {ok: false, error: {code, message}}. Stable error codes: E_APPROVAL_NOT_FOUND, E_APPROVAL_EXPIRED, E_APPROVAL_CONSUMED, E_FINGERPRINT_MISMATCH, E_WRONG_PANE, E_WRONG_WORKSPACE
